description:
Using WPF as the design language has the advantage that also users with Windows XP can benefit of the modern and clean design. 

The project is released under the MS-Public License. So you can use it for private and commercial purposes. We ourself uses the TimePunch Metro WPF Library in our time-recording software TimePunch. So you can be sure, that it will be supported by our development team. But we also appreciate help from the big and enthusiastic C# community.
releaseNotes:
This release contains some enhancements to enable better unit testing.

Therefore we implemented a new interface called INavigationController. Furthermore the protected methods of the ViewModelBase class become public virtual to enable better test integration.
summary: The TimePunch Metro WPF Library has been designed to have a an easy start into developing applications with Microsoft Metro Stil using WPF.
title: TimePunch Metro WPF Library
